main event: A witness reported seeing a metallic object rising straight up into the sky for about 15-20 seconds on 29 October 1965 in Florissant, Missouri.
interesting points: The object was described as metallic and disappeared into the clouds shortly after being observed., The witness was unable to exit their vehicle in time to follow the object., Several other observers reported a similar sighting in the area., The object exhibited unusual behaviors such as sudden acceleration and disappearing/reappearing., A hand-drawn diagram was created by the witness to represent the object's movements but no photographs were taken.
witness description: A male aged 20 who reported the sighting on October 8, 1965.
